column1: References

[1] B. Kitchenham, “Procedures for performing systematic reviews,” Software Engineering Group - Department of Computer Science - Keele University and Empirical SE - National ICT Australia Ltd, Joint Technical Report TR/SE-0401 (Keele) - 0400011T.1 (NICTA), 2004.

[2] B. Kitchenham, D. Budgen, and P. Brereton, Evidence-Based Software Engineering and Systematic Reviews, ser. Chapman & Hall/CRC Innovations in Software Engineering and Software Development Series. Chapman & Hall/CRC, 2015.

[3] K. Petersen, S. Vakkalanka, and L. Kuzniarz, “Guidelines for conducting systematic mapping studies in software engineering: an update,” Information and Software Technology, vol. 64, no. 1, pp. 1–18, 2015.
